[b]i had a birthday 5-6 years ago and i got enough money for buy this game,i did it because previously i was using my friend acc to try out the game,and i find this game amazing,still amazign after many years,but one thing is hard to get it,why so many hacker and griff... on my match even anyone else match. so hard to rank up like this cannot be a team,maybe can carry solo,but why everyone else have to try hard always.Why we cannot play just a normal team match where help each other,anyway.[/b] [h1]THIS GAME AMAZING STILL.GOOD LUCK AND HAVE FUN[/h1]
